response.overview: This INXS studio album is #37 in the SDE Surround Series. Giles Martin has mixed Listen Like Thieves in Dolby Atmos, but there is also a brand new 2025 stereo mix of the album (by Giles Martin and Paul Hicks). They went back to the original masters and built these mixes from the ground up.  Additionally, the SDE exclusive blu-ray offers 15 stereo bonus tracks including extended mixes, B-sides and eight live tracks from a previously unreleased 1986 concert from London's Royal Albert Hall.
response.title: INXS Listen Like Thieves
